byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and MICHAEL WINERIP

abstract: New York State Dept of Corrections names Robert Cunningham as superintendent of Fishkill Correctional Facility in Beacon, NY; Cunningham has been specifically charged with reviewing problems in facility's Building 21, where inmate Samuel Harrell reportedly died after beating by corrections officers.
lead_paragraph: The new superintendent at Fishkill Correctional Facility, Robert Cunningham, is tasked with focusing on a section of the prison where Samuel Harrell, an inmate, died after an encounter with guards.

headline.main: New Superintendent Named at New York Prison Where Inmate Died
headline.print_headline: New Leader for a Prison in Beacon

snippet: The new superintendent at Fishkill Correctional Facility, Robert Cunningham, is tasked with focusing on a section of the prison where Samuel Harrell, an inmate, died after an encounter with guards.
